name: Lost In A Mess
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2021 Theme: "Lost And Found" Game Description:

Little kids lost their toys in a big messy room. Your goal is to help the kids to find their lost toys from the list of missing toys. The faster you find missing toys, the better. Be aware some toys are hidden in a way that might not seem obvious. The list will show you toys that you have to find.

Many hidden object games inspired the game. If you like hidden object games, you will find this game fun. 

The game is easy to play. Just click on the screen to find a missing toy.

All graphics were created during the game jam. 

If you would like to see more levels in this game, let us know.

TOOLS USED:

- Unity 2019: https://unity.com/

- Blender: https://www.blender.org/

- Gimp: https://www.gimp.org/

- Inkscape: https://inkscape.org/

- Fonts: https://www.dafont.com/

- Sounds and Music: https://freesound.org/

CREDITS:

Zoran Gaćeša - Programmer

Marina Lovreković - 3D Artist
